name: Scp Breakdown VR
description:
scp breakdown is a scp game, combing the survival inspect of scp containment breach and a sandbox type game, i hope you enjoy it

there are scp 173, scp 500 and more

if you want to see the futur of the game click this doc -- Scp breakdown vr - Google Docs

if you want to send suggetion and bug fixes come to tyhis discord -- https://discord.gg/56Rq3pmYB
